title: Trying to log into the support site logs me out immediately

replies.body: I've never personally seen this issue before, but I've heard that running through the [browser cache guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) can often resolve this. Let me know if that helped.

Yes, it worked :D I just cleared one hour worth of cache etc on firefox and now it's all fine. Anyways, the thing that happens is that anytime you log in, it takes you to the you have been signed out immediately after.
